amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to add a reporting requirement to sec. 20209 on non-Federal entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Perry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
